SEARCH
Package com.firetrack.service

Class AlertService

java.lang.Object
com.firetrack.service.AlertService
@Service public class AlertService extends Object
Service class for managing alerts and related operations. AlertService provides methods for retrieving, creating, updating, and querying alerts.

  • Method Details

    • getAllAlerts

      public List<Alert> getAllAlerts()
      Retrieve all alerts stored in the database.
      Returns:
      A list of all alerts.

    • createAlert

      public Alert createAlert(Alert alert)
      Create a new alert and store it in the database.
      Parameters:
      alert - The alert object to be created.
      Returns:
      The created alert with updated details.

    • updateAlertStatus

      public Alert updateAlertStatus(Long alertId, Alert alertDetails)
      Update the status of an alert with the given alertId.
      Parameters:
      alertId - The unique identifier of the alert to be updated.
      alertDetails - The updated alert details including status and timestamp.
      Returns:
      The updated alert with the modified details.

    • getAlertsByTrackingPoint

      public List<Alert> getAlertsByTrackingPoint(Long pointId)
      Retrieve all alerts associated with a specific tracking point.
      Parameters:
      pointId - The ID of the tracking point for which alerts are retrieved.
      Returns:
      A list of alerts associated with the specified tracking point.

    • hasActiveAlerts

      public boolean hasActiveAlerts()
      Check if there are any active alerts in the database.
      Returns:
      true if there are active alerts, false otherwise.
